title: Ad Jingles
subtitle: Catchy tunes & vocal performances for leading brands

cards.title: Tarana
cards.description: Soulful vocal rendition for Calapor's brand campaign, blending melody and emotion.

cards.title: Kis Raste Hai Jana
cards.description: Evocative vocals for this Bollywood thriller soundtrack featuring Kangana Ranaut & Rajkummar Rao.

cards.title: Sa Re Ga Ma Carvaan
cards.description: Vocal performance for Saregama Carvaan's iconic ad campaign directed by Amit Sharma.

cards.title: MakeMyTrip Ad
cards.description: Catchy jingle for MakeMyTrip's star-studded campaign featuring Ranveer Singh & Alia Bhatt.

cards.title: Wedding TVC
cards.description: Heartwarming vocal track for Cadbury Dairy Milk's wedding-themed television commercial.

cards.title: #BetterLives For Every Agri Citizen
cards.description: Inspirational vocals for Ninjacart's campaign celebrating India's agricultural community.

cards.title: Maawan Ni Maawan
cards.description: A soulful collaboration with Arjuna Harjai — an emotional track celebrating motherhood.

cards.title: Ambuja Cement Ad
cards.description: Vocal performance with lyrics by Gulzar for Ambuja Cement's inspiring brand campaign.

cards.title: Dettol Dettol Ho
cards.description: Catchy jingle for Dettol's ad film — an instantly memorable hook that stays with you.
